content.query:
SELECT * FROM dbo.approval_history where assignedApprover = 'mayv'


SELECT *
 FROM [dbo].[approval_history]
 WHERE assignedApprover = 'mayv' and labordate >= '2021-12-05T00:00:00.0000000' and labordate <= '2021-12-11T00:00:00.0000000'


DROP EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[approval_history];  


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE approval_history (
    [_ts] bigint,
    [laborId] nvarchar(4000),
    [laborHours] nvarchar(4000),
    [laborTimeZoneId] bigint,
    [laborCategoryId] bigint,
    [submittedFor] nvarchar(4000),
    [submittedBy] nvarchar(4000),
    [laborStatus] nvarchar(4000),
    [laborNotes] nvarchar(4000),
    [partner] nvarchar(4000),
    [assignmentId] nvarchar(4000),
    [assignedApprover] nvarchar(4000),
    [updatedDateTimeInUtc] nvarchar(4000),
    [id] nvarchar(4000),
    [laborDate] date,
    [submittedDateInUtc] date
    )
    WITH (
    LOCATION = 'synapse/workspaces/labormangementsynapseppe/warehouse/approval_history/**',
    DATA_SOURCE = [lmtsynapsefilesystem_lmtsynapsedlppe_dfs_core_windows_net],
    FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
    )
GO
